resources.string: The application needs location and bluetooth permissions to be able to listen for whenever your phone gets disconnected from your car, and to track the location when it happens.
The application needs to be able to track your location while the app is in the background, so that it can save your car location more easily. Please select the option \"%s\" in the following screen.
You\'ll never have to guess where you left your car, ever again!
We\'ll need bluetooth permission in order to listen for whenever your phone gets disconnected from your car
Bluetooth permission is required so that the app can react whenever you exit your car
We\'ll need location permissions in order to save your car location, even when the app is in the background
To get started, select you car from your saved bluetooth devices, and then just drive! The app will show the last parking location here.
